body_html:
@mcr-ksh

Here's the API documentation:
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/GRUCell
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/BasicRNNCell
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/BasicLSTMCell

Note that only BasicLSTMCell has a state_is_tuple argument, the others don't. And also note that the state_is_tuple=False behavior will soon be deprecated, and the default is True. So you should change this line:
https://github.com/sherjilozair/char-rnn-tensorflow/blob/master/model.py#L23

From
cell = cell_fn(args.rnn_size, state_is_tuple=True)
to
cell = cell_fn(args.rnn_size)

For future reference, please limit github issues to bugs or feature requests. We don't have time to debug bugs in all user code, and there is a larger community on StackOverflow to read and answer such questions. Thanks!
body_text:
@mcr-ksh
Here's the API documentation:
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/GRUCell
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/BasicRNNCell
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/BasicLSTMCell
Note that only BasicLSTMCell has a state_is_tuple argument, the others don't.  And also note that the state_is_tuple=False behavior will soon be deprecated, and the default is True.  So you should change this line:
https://github.com/sherjilozair/char-rnn-tensorflow/blob/master/model.py#L23
From
cell = cell_fn(args.rnn_size, state_is_tuple=True)
to
cell = cell_fn(args.rnn_size)
For future reference, please limit github issues to bugs or feature requests.  We don't have time to debug bugs in all user code, and there is a larger community on StackOverflow to read and answer such questions.  Thanks!
body:
@mcr-ksh 

Here's the API documentation:
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/GRUCell
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/BasicRNNCell
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/rnn/BasicLSTMCell

Note that only `BasicLSTMCell` has a `state_is_tuple` argument, the others don't.  And also note that the state_is_tuple=False behavior will soon be deprecated, and the default is True.  So you should change this line:
https://github.com/sherjilozair/char-rnn-tensorflow/blob/master/model.py#L23

From 
`cell = cell_fn(args.rnn_size, state_is_tuple=True)`
to
`cell = cell_fn(args.rnn_size)`

For future reference, please limit github issues to bugs or feature requests.  We don't have time to debug bugs in all user code, and there is a larger community on [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) to read and answer such questions.  Thanks!
